message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't commit to $9,500. Would you consider $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a bit closer to my asking price. How about $9,250?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,100 for the product. This is my final offer.
